item.title: Passive Reconnaissance
item.description: Identifing Our Target linkNeed to identify What’s within the SCOPE and What’s not. Example: https://bugcrowd.com/tesla Discovering Email Addresses linkHunter.io linkhunter.io also can identify the pattern of the email address. In this case it is {f}{last}@tesla.com which means {fist name initial}{last name}@tesla.com If you have an account created, you can see alot more information about the email addresses of the target. Phonebook.cz link

item.title: Portscan
item.description: Port Specification Options link Switch/Flag Example Description -p nmap -p 21 127.0.0.1 Scanning Specific Port -p nmap -p 21-100 127.0.0.1 Scanning Specific Port Range -sU sudo nmap -sU 110 127.0.0.1 UDP Port Scanning -p- nmap -p- 127.0.0.1 All Port Scanning -F nmap -F 127.0.0.1 Fast mode - Scan fewer ports than the default scan Port Scanning Types link Switch/Flag Example Description -sS nmap -sS 127.0.0.1 TCP SYN Scan -sT nmap -sT 127.
